thread.title: Shareholder advisor Hermes EOS for more effective leadership at Deutsche Bank

title: Shareholder advisor Hermes EOS for more effective leadership at Deutsche Bank
text:
May 22, 2018 / 7:57 AM / Updated 21 minutes ago Shareholder advisor Hermes EOS for more effective leadership at Deutsche Bank Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Shareholder advisor Hermes EOS on Tuesday called for more effective leadership at Deutsche Bank ( DBKGn.DE ) and said the supervisory board should start to consider a succession plan for the bank’s chairman. FILE PHOTO: The headquarters of the Deutsche Bank is pictured in Frankfurt, Germany, March 19, 2018. REUTERS/Ralph Orlowski/File Photo
“We ask whether the management board changes could simply mask an underlying problem, namely, the lack of an implementable strategy that creates value for shareholders and other stakeholders,” Hans-Christoph Hirt, head of Hermes EOS at Hermes Investment Management, said in a statement. Reporting by Tom Sims; Editing by Caroline Copley
